name: YITH Color and Label Variations for WooCommerce
author: YITH

sections.description:
Replace the WooCommerce default select and use color swatches, images, and labels to show the options available on your products
In your e-commerce, you sell products that are available in different variations (sizes, colors, patterns, etc.); for each variation, WooCommerce inserts a “select,” which is a drop-down menu with the list of all the options selectable by users on your product pages.
This is a compromising solution for your shop aesthetics since it is not user-friendly and can be an obstacle to sales: imagine how frustrating the experience can be for a customer who has to choose the color of a T-shirt by selecting it from a list with simple texts without the visual support of color swatches.
YITH WooCommerce Color, Image & Label Variation Swatches is a plugin that allows you to replace WooCommerce selects with icons, custom images and dynamic labels. Size, color, fabric type, stone shape, buttons color, size of a necklace…regardless of the product you sell, this tool is an effective and free solution to better represent the options available for your products and offer your customers a better shopping experience.

Main features

  • Create “Color swatches” attributes
  • Set the color swatches size and border radius on the product page
  • Create “Image” attributes
  • Create “Label” attributes
  • Customize the border color of options
  • Show attributes on product pages

Check the Live Demo >

Need more? Get premium

The free version of our plugin works like a charm, but if you need a more versatile and complete solution, the premium version is what you need. Still unsure? Remember that our 30-day money-back guarantee is available on all our plugins!

With the premium version you can:

  • Show attributes also on the shop, category, and other pages, not only on the product page;
  • Create bicolor swatches to show two-color samples
  • Override attributes global style in specific products
  • Set text tooltips and/or with preview images for each attribute
  • Choose whether to show the attribute description or not on the product page
  • Replace the product image when hovering over the attribute
  • Show the available attributes or not in the tab “Additional information” on the product page
  • Show variations as separate products on the Shop page
  • Customize the text of the “Add to cart” button when a variation is selected
  • Set a different image gallery for each product variation
  • …and much more!

Check the Premium Live Demo >

Languages

Also available in:

  • English
  • Italian
  • Spanish
  • Dutch

Documentation

Please, read the the official documentation of YITH Color and Label Variations for WooCommerce to learn about all the plugin features.

About YITH, the authors of this plugin

YITH is an independent company in the development and sales of WooCommerce plugins. With 15-year experience and a catalog of over 100 plugins used by nearly two and a half million users, YITH has the ambitious goal of making e-commerce usable by everyone through plugins that improve usability and extend the basic functionality of WordPress and WooCommerce.
sections.installation:
Important: First of all, you have to download and activate WooCommerce plugin, because without it YITH Color and Label Variations for WooCommerce cannot work.

  1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate YITH Color and Label Variations for WooCommerce from Plugins page.

Configuration

YITH Color and Label Variations for WooCommerce will add a new tab called “Color and Label Variations” in “YITH” menu item. There, you will find all YITH plugins with quick access to plugin setting page.
sections.faq:
How can I get support if my WooCommerce plugin is not working?

If you have problems with our plugins or something is not working as it should, first follow this preliminary steps:

  • Test the plugin with a WordPress default theme, to be sure that the error is not caused by the theme you are currently using.
  • Deactivate all plugins you are using and check if the problem is still occurring.
  • Ensure that you plugin version, your theme version and your WordPress and WooCommerce version (if required) are updated and that the problem you are experiencing has not already been solved in a later plugin update.

If none of the previous listed actions helps you solve the problem, then, submit a ticket in the forum and describe your problem accurately, specify WordPress and WooCommerce versions you are using and any other information that might help us solve your problem as quickly as possible.
If you are using the premium version of the plugin, we invite you ask for assistance in our support desk.

How many attributes can I use for each product ?

There’s no limit in the amount of attributes you may use. You can create many variations for each product using the configured attributes.

My users found some issues when selecting attributes on products. They cannot switch from one attribute to the other of the same type.

This is a known issue, which does not depend on a malfunctioning, though,, but on the fact that WooCommerce requires the chosen attribute to be deselected before another of the same type could be selected.

sections.reviews:
Problema con la visualización

By jllifecoach on October 27, 2022

Uso el tema de OceanWp instale el plugin y puse las tallas. Cuando el cliente le da a limpiar la seleccion del producto desaparecen las opciones de selección. Tambien aparece abajo una barra de seleccion cuando no debería de aparecer.

Quite simple and functional.

By Rodrigo Wolpert (selvatur) on September 17, 2022

Automatically hides unavailable options in stock. Very good.

Existing attributes

By gaet on June 16, 2022

Hi, If attributes have been created before installation plugin, it's not possible to set the type (color, image, label...). I've to create a new to have the choice. Is there a solution to set color type to an existing attribute ? Thanks

Nothing in this free version

By Khong Ngu (mrthuc) on May 30, 2022

It has no feature just simply asking you to buy the premium version

Mal manejo de la publicidad

By mavelar on April 20, 2022

Dificil de manejar... mucho anuncio

Awesome Plugin

By Mike (avagolf) on February 26, 2022

Very fast and easy way to remove drop down variations! And amazing support too!

DON'T INTALL IT

By vip1724 on January 25, 2022

It has no feature just simply asking you to buy the premium version, has nothing in this free version

very helpful plugins

By virtual03 on January 13, 2022

gives the option to upload extra pictures for each variation, also variation pictures can be shown on the shop page

good

By ngokremorse on December 5, 2021

good!

Simple, light and functional

By selvamaraventura on November 12, 2021

Just add one of the three offered attributes (Colorpicker, Image and Label) and see everything work by itself, without any complications.

short_description: YITH WooCommerce Color and Label Variations replaces the dropdown select of your variable products with Colors and Labels
